data.title: H. P. Lovecraft
data.text:
[1] Jane Brown Memorial Hospital, Providence, RI.

Father: Winfield Scott Lovecraft (traveling salesman, d. 19-Jul-1898, syphilis)

Mother: Sarah Susan Phillips (d. 24-May-1921, complications of surgery)

Girlfriend: Winifred Virginia Jackson

Wife: Sonia Haft Greene (Ukrainian Jew, b. 16-Mar-1883, m. 3-Mar-1924, div. 1929)

High School: Hope Street High School (dropped out 1908)

Nervous Breakdown 1908

White Supremacists

Risk Factors: Depression

Author of books:

The Case of Charles Dexter Ward (1928, novella)

At the Mountains of Madness (1931, novella)

The Shadow over Innsmouth (1936, novella)

Do you know something we don't?

Submit a correction or make a comment about this profile
